paper.title: Early Warning System of Financial Risk of China's Foreign Investment
paper.abstract: In this paper, we identify the components of financial risk in China's foreign investment, and then construct an index system of the risk. Using annual data from 1994-2008, we set up an early-warning system of financial risk of China's foreign investment based on the Artificial Neural Network (ANN), which includes five models respectively measuring four aspects of financial risk and overall financial risk. We also predict the financial risk of China's foreign investment in 2009 with the early-warning system.

domain_result.justification: The paper focuses on constructing an early-warning system for financial risk in China's foreign investment using Artificial Neural Network (ANN), which is a direct application in the field of financial risk management.
